mapper.select: SELECT ad.*, c.computer_title, c.computer_sale_price, p.peripheral_title, p.peripheral_sale_price FROM ask_detail ad LEFT JOIN computer c ON ad.computer_no = c.computer_no LEFT JOIN peripheral p ON ad.peripheral_no = p.peripheral_no WHERE ad.ask_no = #{askNo}

select *, (select opt_name from opt where d.opt_ssd = opt.opt_no) as ssd_name, (select opt_name from opt where d.opt_hdd = opt.opt_no) as hdd_name, (select opt_name from opt where d.opt_os = opt.opt_no) as os_name from ask_detail d left join ask a on d.ask_no = a.ask_no left join computer c on d.computer_no = c.computer_no left join peripheral p on d.peripheral_no = p.peripheral_no left join file f on d.computer_no = f.computer_no or d.peripheral_no = f.peripheral_no left join review r on d.computer_no = r.computer_no or d.peripheral_no = r.peripheral_no where a.ask_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY ) AND NOW() and d.ask_detail_user = #{email} and a.ask_state_flag > 0 and a.ask_delete_flag = 0 order by d.ask_no desc limit #{offset}, #{limit};
